Text:
Another great sounding V-rip! Another great album!

Barely any surface noise, lush bass and highs that seem steady throughout.

Thanks :)
Not good..... typical HMV rip.  There are many, many others out there that are far superior.  Anyone with ears should look elsewhere.
I have the same TT you do!  Can't wait to hear your needledrop here.  Thanks!

Awesome! glad to hear someone has the same TT :D 

It's a heavy mother eh?

Thank you, HMVinyl !!!
One of these days I'm gonna climb this WALL and listen to it !
